Class ImageModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageModifier

  • public class ImageModifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Laura Bastin ImageAnalyser allows to modify pixels of a BufferedImage. An ImageModifier is caracterised by the File that the BufferedImage will use.
